name: ronolo/json-database
description: A lightweight JSON document database, which sits on top of ronolo/json-store and adds relations and caching of JSON documents.

suggest.league/flysystem-ziparchive: Allows to have a single ZIP file as database
suggest.league/flysystem-memory: Allows to have a database in memory
suggest.league/flysystem-cached-adapter: Allows to have a memory/persistent cache like database
